name: CL_MYC_MED
description: This table contains high-level information for medications.  It is similar to CLARITY_MEDICATION, but it is used exclusively by web based chart system. When a web based chart system patient enters a medication name in medication section of Your Health Record, this table will be searched for a matching medication.

columns.name: MYC_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the web based chart system medication record

columns.name: MYC_MED_ID_MED_NAME
columns.description: The name of the web based chart system medication.

columns.name: MED_NAME
columns.description: The name of the web based chart system medication.
